text: Everyone, we are migrating from slack to <https://chat.hyperledger.org/channel/twg-china>. Pls feel free to login with the same LF id/password. Thanks!

Hyperledger Technical Community,

We are getting ready to launch the Hyperledger Summer Internship Program.  In preparation for this, we are calling for Mentors (and project suggestions) from the Community.

If you are interested in potentially mentoring an intern, please indicate your interest by completing the following form by Friday, February 17th <https://goo.gl/forms/3MvSU13hX0XVlQj33>.

attachments.title: Hyperledger Internship Program 2017 - Call for Mentors
